content.en: Rotor System Algorithms: Researchers have developed algorithms to address various challenges in rotor systems levitated by active magnetic bearings (AMBs). These algorithms can identify dynamic parameters, estimate residual unbalances, compensate for unbalance, and analyze faults such as misalignment. By utilizing these algorithms, excessive vibration can be suppressed, and high-speed balancing can be performed effectively. These advancements in algorithmic technology contribute to the improvement of rotor system performance and reliability.
content.da: Rotor System Algoritmer: Forskere har udviklet algoritmer til at tackle forskellige udfordringer i rotorsystemer, der svæver ved hjælp af aktive magnetiske lejer (AMBs). Disse algoritmer kan identificere dynamiske parametre, estimere resterende ubalancer, kompensere for ubalance og analysere fejl såsom fejljustering. Ved at anvende disse algoritmer kan overdreven vibration undertrykkes, og højhastighedsafbalancering kan udføres effektivt. Disse fremskridt inden for algoritmeteknologi bidrager til forbedring af rotorsystemernes ydeevne og pålidelighed.
